posts.post_content:
My wife put me on a spending freeze the last few months in preparation of moving in October. So trying to find different ways of still collecting.  I’m currently have 99 different fronts.



These are a list of my extras I have available for trade. I would love to make a few deals.  The majority of what I have so far is Graded between 1 and 3. Thanks, Rob

Pics of my checklist
[URL="https://www.flickr.com/photos/164679438@N03/with/48547076221/"]https://www.flickr.com/photos/164679438@N03/with/48547076221/[/URL]

Danny Hoffman A P350 $28
Newt Randall 2 SC 350/30 $33


Feel free to PM and I can get Pics over via Email or Text

Bump, trade pending. Trade Values for the rest of them listed.
Offers? Lowered prices removed traded and sold.  Help me spoil my son for his birthday without the wife knowing. Smile 😀
